ing.item: Granny smith apples; cored, peeled and cut into chunks

directions.step:
In a saucepan, combine the apples, lemon juice, sugar, vanilla extract, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cook until softened and let cool. Lightly roll out a piece of white bread and place some filling in
the center of the bread. Fold one corner over diagonally, forming a turnover. Pinch the edges closed. The turnovers can be frozen at this point. If baking, preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Brush the top of the turnover lightly with the melted butter and place on a cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes or until golden.
Yield: 8 turnovers
